the word fate means the course of a

they are migrant and refugee the word

as to escape persecution and

a refugee is a person who has been
forced to flee from their native country

in search of a safe haven refugees often

transportation a person who seeks refuge

both of these words together a migrant
and refugee are not the same a migrant

moves by choice while a refugee moves as
a last resort for their very survival
